column4: lol I have a general question.. when did ubuntu stop using /dev/hda1  layout and got all to /dev/sda1 type.. I thought it was comfusing my ide for serial
lol I upgraded from that to 8.04 the other day.. it was acting crazying couldn't mount a ext3 drive for the life of me.. just did a clean install since I have everything divided up so much
